channel.title: Astronomy fact of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomy fact of the day.

item.title: Sri Lankan Astronomy and Astrophysics Olympiad
item.description: The Sri Lankan Astronomy and Astrophysics Olympiad is a competition for Sri Lankan high school students on Astronomy and Astrophysics. It is the highest and the only government sponsored competition in the field of Astronomy, in Sri Lanka.
